original_text: Pharaoh investigated and found that not even one of the animals of the Israelites had died. Yet his heart was unyielding and he would not let the people go.
korean_text: 바로가 사람을 보내어 본즉 이스라엘의 가축은 하나도 죽지 아니하였더라 그러나 바로의 마음이 완강하여 백성을 보내지 아니하니라

sentences.original_text: and found that not even one of the animals
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 사람들의 짐승 중에서 하나도 죽지 않았다는 것을

sentences.original_text: and he would not let the people go.
